content: with caron one pound yarn make as many blankets as your heart desires whether for a boy or girl for donating or keeping choose from so many shades for this easy-to-make project plus as a machine washable and dryable worsted weight yarn you ll keep smiling because caron one pound is the ideal choice to withstand all sorts of kids little messes materials caron® one pound™ 16 oz/454 g 812 yds/742 m version 1 soft pink 10513 1 ball or 812 yds/742 m version 2 succulent 10655 1 ball or 812 yds/742 m measurements approx 35½ x 36 90 x 91 5 cm
